messages.subject: Starting an uns. group/was directed to K. Lovejoy
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the prompt response Kelly, Rue and Pam!  We watch a lot of Scooby around here, so the misspell was totally understood as proactive!  To answer your
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the prompt response Kelly, Rue and Pam! We watch a lot of
Scooby around here, so the misspell was totally understood as
proactive! To answer your question, we live about an hour south of
St. Louis, MO. I checked out the site Rue suggested. Looks really
interesting. I am hoping to get a few families going out here in the
boonies so I don't have to drive so far for the St. Louis group
activities. I participate in a St. Louis group and had found a
family that was in the southern suburbs, but they moved! So instead,
I'm shifting my focus. My girls are old enough to help out too! And
as for showing up at functions by yourself, Pam, 90% of the
activities we've done in the past 10 months have been just us. My
13yo dd even tried getting her friends together on a Saturday
afternoon for a matinee recently and 4 of the 6 invited dropped out
at the last minute. It ended up being like a DATE! Oh well, we
still plan the activities cuz they are so fun! Just need to take all
this wonderful info and get moving on it!
